trans-unit.source: Computes masks according to PKCS #1 for use by key exchange algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 计算用于掩码根据 PKCS #1 密钥交换算法。

trans-unit.source: This class is only used by implementations of key exchange algorithms for mask generation.
trans-unit.target: 用于掩码生成此类仅使用由密钥交换算法的实现。

trans-unit.source: Application code does not use this class directly.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码不直接使用此类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.PKCS1MaskGenerationMethod"></xref> class.
This constructor sets <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PKCS1MaskGenerationMethod.HashName%2A> to the default hash algorithm name (SHA1).
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PKCS1MaskGenerationMethod.HashName%2A>到默认哈希算法名称 (SHA1)。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.PKCS1MaskGenerationMethod.HashName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Generates and returns a mask from the specified random seed of the specified length.
trans-unit.target: 生成并从指定长度的指定随机种子返回掩码。

trans-unit.source: Masks are used in key exchange computation and generally are not used by applications.
trans-unit.target: 掩码在密钥交换计算中使用，通常不由应用程序使用。

trans-unit.source: The random seed to use for computing the mask.
trans-unit.target: 要用于计算掩码的随机种子。

trans-unit.source: The length of the generated mask in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 生成的掩码，以字节为单位的长度。

trans-unit.source: A randomly generated mask whose length is equal to the cbReturn parameter.
trans-unit.target: 随机生成的掩码其长度等于 cbReturn 参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the hash algorithm type to use for generating the mask.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于生成掩码的哈希算法类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: If no hash algorithm is specified, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1> is used by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果未不指定任何哈希算法，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>默认情况下使用。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1>

trans-unit.source: The name of the type that implements the hash algorithm to use for computing the mask.
trans-unit.target: 实现用于计算掩码的哈希算法类型的名称。
